Card.title: What is SPORTAL?
Card.content: SPORTAL is our company's Data Catalog & Discovery solution. However, even after being introduced to clients, it was rarely used in practice. It remained merely an "entry point" to other solutions, and was developed without planning or design resources, lacking even basic usability—which led to a full-scale improvement project.

StowGenie.SubTitle: Container Ship Loading Solution
StowGenie.Title: StowGenie
StowGenie.Slogan: Embark on a Magical Voyage with StowGenie – Where Every Container Finds its Perfect Location!

Card.title: What is the StowGenie?
Card.content: This solution helps planners manage container loading tasks more easily and efficiently compared to existing tools. By incorporating Gamification, Data Visualization, Web Interaction, AI, and UI/UX, it simplifies and automates the process. As a result, the solution significantly improves work efficiency and user experience for planners.

MUKI.SubTitle: User Location-Based Solution
MUKI.Title: MUKI
MUKI.Slogan: Business innovation, realized directly in the field.

Card.title: What is the MUKI?
Card.content: MUKI is a solution that significantly enhances the efficiency of bancassurance sales agents by automating the manual task of writing daily reports, which used to be done with a notebook. Using a location-based app, sales agents can now automatically log their tasks in real-time without needing to return to the office. This allows for seamless task management on the go, while managers can easily oversee the activities of their sales teams. In this project, I was responsible for UI/UX design and publishing, creating a user-friendly interface and improving the overall user experience.

mAOiA.Title: mAOiA
mAOiA.Content: The mAOiA solution is a system designed to manage real-time outbound data in maritime shipping and port operations, offering data-driven analysis and insights to support efficient outbound planning and operational decision-making. Its key features include the automation of outbound management, special cargo handling, and container stowage planning (Bayplan), providing visualized insights to assist managers in easily analyzing the data.

JO.Title: JO
JO.Content: The solution is designed to effectively manage the complex processes of settlement, revenue distribution, BSA contract management, allocation settings, monthly settlement, and data validation for shipping companies and ports. Its core functionality lies in automating and monitoring the distribution of revenue and costs among multiple stakeholders in jointly operated shipping routes, as well as managing BSA agreements.

NH.Title: NH
NH.Content: This solution program is an integrated management system designed to efficiently manage company vehicles, employee leave schedules, and various materials. It automates complex asset management and scheduling tasks, aiming to reduce time and costs while maximizing operational efficiency.

FloraFusion.Title: Flora Fusion
FloraFusion.Content: Flora Fusion is a solution app designed to help users manage their plants and gardens. It automates schedules for watering, sunlight, fertilizing, and repotting. Users can share photos of their gardens and pots like a social media platform, interacting with others through likes, comments, and shares. Additionally, users can raise virtual plants, earning real plants as rewards for reaching goals. The app also offers product purchases and a search function for plant care information, making it easy to find everything you need.

JobSeeking.Title: Job Seeking...
JobSeeking.Content: I am looking for a partner to collaborate on projects.
